text: Hinder is an Oklahoma based rock group. Their hit singles are Lips of an Angel, How Long and Get Stoned. The group have numerous other hit songs besides these. ==Discography== ;Studio albums * Extreme Behavior (2005) * Take It to the Limit (2008) * All American Nightmare (2010) * Welcome to the Freakshow (2012) * When the Smoke Clears (2015) * The Reign (2017) ==References== Category:Musical groups from Oklahoma Category:American rock bands
title: Hinder
